channel.title: Steam Gift Trade
channel.description: So I have an extra copy of Half Life 2: Episode One on my steam account and I just noticed that you can trade gifts now. If anyone wants Episode One I would like to trade it for a game that I don't already have. Basically if anyone is interested and wants to trade tell me what your willing to gift me and I'll choose the game that looks the most interesting. Anyone game?

item.title: Steam Gift Trade
item.dc:creator: EaglesNestOne
item.description:
freundin88:

Me too. I have an extra copy of Half Life 2 and Half Life 2 Ep.1. I can’t even give em away. They must have come with the Orange Box or something. But anyone is welcome to have them if they want.

I’d be more than happy to take HL2:Ep1. I’m afraid I have nothing to offer in return however :C

Read full topic

item.title: Steam Gift Trade

item.description:
I’m willing to trade for a game that’s worth a buck, I don’t really care as long as its fun.

item.title: Steam Gift Trade
item.dc:creator: Siggs
item.description:
I’ll give you a copy of portal for it.

I can be sure no one has played that.

item.description:
You could always just send that gift my way I don’t have HL2:EP1 for PC. I ain’t tradin shit for it though :3

item.title: Steam Gift Trade
item.dc:creator: papernick
item.description:
I don’t, since people that are waiting for the remake of a HL game have most likely played the rest of the saga.

Good luck anyway.
